mapper.insert:
select case when max(id) is null then 1 else max(id)+1 end as "id" from fui_dict_entry
insert into fui_dict_entry (id, dict_code, dict_entry_code, dict_entry_desc, dict_entry_sort) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dictCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictEntryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictEntryDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictEntrySort,jdbcType=BIGINT})

id,

dict_entry_desc = #{dictEntryDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM fui_dict_entry WHERE id = #{id} AND dict_code = #{dictCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE fui_dict_entry SET dict_code = #{dictCode}, dict_entry_code = #{dictEntryCode}, dict_entry_desc = #{dictEntryDesc}, dict_entry_sort = #{dictEntrySort} WHERE id = #{id} AND dict_code = #{dictCode}
